data.title: Next.js
data.description: Next.js is a React framework that enables several extra features, including server-side rendering and generating static websites.

data.title: Setting Up a Next.js Project
data.description: Learn how to create a new Next.js project using npx create-next-app.
data.code:
npx create-next-app my-app
cd my-app
npm run dev
